## Louisiana, US

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map<-leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() 
my_map<-my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat=29.9922, lng=-90.2590,
             popup="New Orleans Airport")
my_map
```
